revised_title: Determining the Relative Situation of Royal Observatories of Greenwich and Paris
tldr: The author presents a plan to determine the relative situation of the Royal Observatories of Greenwich and Paris using triangulation and measurement of a base on Hounslow-Heath. The plan involves using a new type of instrument to measure angles with high precision and adhering to principles of equilateral triangles and accurate intersections. The author also discusses the potential for determining the situations of other landmarks within London.
